meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively eager or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: Her overeagernesses to help often led to mistakes.
meanings.sent2: His overeagernesses to win the game made him rush his decisions.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's overeagernesses to greet visitors resulted in chaos at the front door.
meanings.sent4: The overeagernesses of the new employee to impress the boss were evident in every task.
meanings.sent5: The overeagernesses of the children to open their presents on Christmas morning was contagious.

meanings.definition: Excessive or extreme eagerness or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: The overeagernesses of the fans to meet the celebrity caused a commotion.
meanings.sent2: Her overeagernesses to participate in every activity sometimes overwhelmed her friends.
meanings.sent3: The overeagernesses of the squirrel to gather nuts led to a hilarious chase around the tree.
meanings.sent4: His overeagernesses to prove his point in the debate made him stumble over his words.
meanings.sent5: The overeagernesses of the students to answer the teacher's question showed their enthusiasm for learning.
